name: resolidification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of changing from being a liquid or gas back into a solid form again, or of making something do this: There are a few small holes caused by the resolidification of molten material. We observed large-scale melting and re-solidification. Related word
solidify
More examplesFewer examplesOnce the temperature is brought back down, the product will solidify again, but any damage that has occurred before resolidification cannot be undone. Due to fluctuating temperatures, fast cooling with resolidification may occur.Figure 6 shows the surface melting, and then resolidification after laser treatment of the polymer.
